sentences.en: Workers' comp pays for work-related medical problems.
sentences.cn: 工人们的赔偿金支付了职业病的医疗费。

sentences.en: Sit down to read and the flywheel of work-related thoughts keeps spinning—or else you're so exhausted that a challenging book's the last thing you need.
sentences.cn: 坐下来阅读时，与工作相关的思绪像飞轮一样不停地旋转——也许你实在是筋疲力尽，最不需要的就是一本有挑战性的书。

sentences.en: He said there was no evidence the deaths were work-related.
sentences.cn: 他说没有证据显示这些死亡是与工作相关的。
